name: Singing Pitch Training App
body:
Detail can be found in 
http://people.sutd.edu.sg/~1000791/publication/

Kin Wah Edward Lin, Hans Anderson, M.H.M. Hamzeen, Simon Lui 2014. “Implementation and Evaluation of Real-Time Interactive User Interface Design in Self-learning Singing Pitch Training Apps”. Joint Conference of the 40th International Computer Music Conference (ICMC) and the 11th Sound and Music Computing Conference (SMC), Athens, Greece. (Accepted paper, to appear) [31% acceptance rate]
